logoFingerprint.notes: The shorts feature a blend of decoration techniques, combining full-garment sublimation for the base pattern, heat-transfer for crisp text, raised silicone for prominent script logos, and both direct embroidery and an embroidered patch for detailed graphics on different panels. The garment construction utilizes mesh fabric for breathability and layered panels for aesthetic detailing, typical of premium athletic and streetwear shorts.

modelPose: Athletic stance, one leg forward showing side graphic, confident sports editorial energy
